title: Issue Tracking Manager
description:
Issue Tracking Manager ITM 
 
Overview  
Software product for organization, management and control of the work process in your company. 
It is used to improve the communication between the employees in a company. 
People working in a team would benefit using ITM by exchanging ideas, tasks, attached documents, comments etc. 
ITM provides email notification, task history and many other useful features Managers could easily track how personnel do their work. 
ITM is a product easy to work with and targets to synchronize your work process  


Features  
web-based architecture: users stay connected with ITM at any time and at any location with a full-featured web browser client
Role-based access control: Administrators and project managers can control individual user access to pages and fields based on their role or issue status.
Email notification: Send email notifications through an extensive list of triggers and recipient choices.  
File attachments: files/documents to any issue.
Search engine: Easy and fast serch capability.
Presentation Reports: detailed reports with filter and print functions, export to PDF, XLS, RTF, TXT, PNG 


System requirements
Server
- Windows 2000, Windows NT 4.0 Server, Windows 2003 or Windows XP profesional  
- Pentium PC with 512MB memory and 50MB free disk space 
- Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) 5.0 and above 
- Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0 
- Microsoft SQL Server 2005  express 

Supported Web Browsers 
- Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 and above 
- FireFox 2.0 and above
